title: Turkey breast steak in white wine
ingredients: ['1 to 2 red peppers', '1 onion', '5-6 mushrooms', '1 teaspoon ground coriander', '1 teaspoon ground ginger', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1 pinch salt and pepper', '1 lemon, juiced', '500ml white wine', '4 turkey breast steaks', '25g butter', '1 tablespoon plain flour or cornflour']
